genresAdvancedInfo.name: pontian folk
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Pontian folk is a traditional music genre that originates from the Pontian region in Turkey. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the kemenche, tulum, and zurna. The lyrics often tell stories of love, loss, and the struggles of everyday life.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
